dmca.title: Stolen Intellectual Property
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that all below-referenced URLs are currently not accessible
as of 3:09:07 p.m. (GMT-6) on October 27, 2006.

Legal Response Team


-----Original Message-----
From: Alaina Jeffers [mailto:ali_26@hotmail.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 10:13 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Stolen Intellectual Property
Subject: Re: Stolen Intellectual Property


In addition, all six sites seem to breach 18 U.S.C. section 2257 because
the front pages show explicit shots of sexual parts and there is no
statement of compliance, nor any requirement that non-adults leave the
site. Under 18s accessing any of these sites go straight to sexual
nudity.



The following websites contain several of MY stories, which are MY
intellectual and copyrighted property.  As you are the host site for
these disgusting pornography sites I would think that you would be very
quick in making sure that they are dealt with.  Also, please note that
the imagery on the sites is obscene and no disclaimer or warning of
content is offered.  I believe that this may also be a legal issue.

www.starznaked.com
http://sex-cinema.net
http://beingfucked.com
http://xxlpenis.com
http://sexvids.org
http://pornvids.org

Intellectual Property Infringement Policy (excerpted from The Planet
AUP) Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache,
host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or
work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The
Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content
to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.

The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the
Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's
Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.
Intellectual Property Infringement Policy (excerpted from EV1Servers
AUP)

Copyright or trademark infringement: Use of the EV1Servers service to
transmit any material (by e-mail, uploading, posting, hot linking,
directly linking or otherwise) that infringes any copyright, trademark,
patent, trade secret or other proprietary rights of any third party,
including, but not limited to, the unauthorized copying of copyrighted
material, the digitization and distribution of photographs from
magazines, books, or other copyrighted sources, and the unauthorized
transmittal of copyrighted software.

Infringement of Copyright, Patent, Trademark, Trade Secret, or
Intellectual Property Right: Distribution and/or posting of copyrighted
or the aforementioned infringements will not be tolerated.

Pursuant to your written policies I am formally requesting that you take
immediate action, suspending said sites without hesitation.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

SweetWitch
Authur, The Spell of Appalachia
